name: Manush Sekaran C
profile: Certified Network Engineer with a strong foundation in configuring and managing network infrastructures. Proficient in routing, switching, and network troubleshooting, backed by Cisco CCNA certification. Experienced in Windows Server 2019 and ethical hacking to enhance network security. Skilled in deploying scalable, secure cloud solutions using a wide range of AWS services including EC2, S3, IAM, Lambda, RDS, VPC, Auto Scaling, ELB, and CloudWatch.
about: I am a certified Network Engineer with a solid background in configuring and managing network infrastructures. Having completed the Cisco CCNA certification, I possess strong skills in routing, switching, and network troubleshooting. I also have hands-on experience with Windows Server 2019 and ethical hacking to strengthen network security. In addition, I am well-versed in a variety of AWS services such as EC2, S3, IAM, Lambda, RDS, and more. My expertise includes designing and deploying scalable, secure cloud solutions using VPC, Auto Scaling, ELB, and CloudWatch.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology

certifications.name: Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA)
certifications.description: The CCNA certification validates knowledge and skills in networking fundamentals, IP connectivity, security fundamentals, and automation.

certifications.name: Data Strucutures and Algorithms using Java
certifications.description: The Data Structures and Algorithms certification from NPTEL demonstrates proficiency in data structures, algorithms, and their applications in problem-solving.

projects.name: An Intelligent Two-Layer Intrusion detection System for the Internet of Things
projects.description: Developed a two-layer intelligent intrusion detection system for IoT using flow-based and packet-based features. Implemented feature optimization to improve anomaly detection accuracy and reduce detection time. Minimized system time overhead for efficient real-time threat response.
